head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FLANNERY, HONORA V.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FLANNERY, HONORA V.

block.p: FLANNERY-Honora V. Dear twin sister to Alma P. Nittoli. Beloved aunt to Jeanne Marie Oliva, Drs. Paul J. Nittoli and Susan Cizek; Janice M. Nittoli and Eric C. Andrus. Caring and joyful godmother to Joseph A. Nittoli. Suddenly passed away June 25. Being waked Tuesday and Wednesday at Martin A. Gleason Funeral Home, 149-20 Northern Blvd., Flushing, NY. Funeral Mass, 9:30 AM, Thurs. St. John Vianney R.C. Church, 34 Ave & Union St., Flushing. Donations may be made to St. Francis Bread Line, 135 W. 31st, NY, NY 10001

FLANNERY-Honora V. Dear twin sister to Alma P. Nittoli. Beloved aunt to Jeanne Marie Oliva, Drs. Paul J. Nittoli and Susan Cizek; Janice M. Nittoli and Eric C. Andrus. Caring and joyful godmother to Joseph A. Nittoli. Suddenly passed away June 25. Being waked Tuesday and Wednesday at Martin A. Gleason Funeral Home, 149-20 Northern Blvd., Flushing, NY. Funeral Mass, 9:30 AM, Thurs. St. John Vianney R.C. Church, 34 Ave & Union St., Flushing. Donations may be made to St. Francis Bread Line, 135 W. 31st, NY, NY 10001
